get.description: List databases names, users and sizes.

parameters.description: privileges is optional. When not provided, privileges will be 'ALL'.
parameters.name: createDatabaseUserDto

put.description: Move a dir/file, update name and/or permissions (Only sourcePath is required).

parameters.description: permissions is optional. When not provided, permissions will be '644' for files and '755' for directories.
parameters.name: createFileDto

get.description: List marketplace catalog services names, types, steps and more.

parameters.description: directory will be the virtual host root directory.
parameters.name: InstallMarketplaceCatalogItem

parameters.description: Should uninstall all services that were installed with the marketplace item installation? Default is 'true'.
parameters.name: shouldUninstallServices

get.description: Show system information and resource usage.
Get php version, modules and settings for a hostname.

put.description: Update php version, modules and settings for a hostname.

get.description: List installed services and their status.

parameters.description:
Only name is required.
Solo services can only change status.
status may be 'running', 'stopped' or 'uninstalled'.
parameters.name: updateServiceDto

parameters.description:
name, type and startCmd is required.
If version is not provided, it will be 'lts'.
If portBindings is not provided, it wil be default service port bindings.
If autoCreateMapping is not provided, it will be 'true'.
parameters.name: createCustomServiceDto

parameters.description:
Only name is required.
If version is not provided, it will be 'lts'.
If portBindings is not provided, it wil be default service port bindings.
If autoCreateMapping is not provided, it will be 'true'.
parameters.name: createInstallableServiceDto

parameters.description:
All props are required.
virtualHosts may be string or []string. Alias is not allowed.
certificate is a string field, i.e. ignore the structure shown.
certificate and key must be base64 encoded.
parameters.name: createSslPairDto

put.description: Delete vhosts from a ssl pair.

parameters.description:
Only hostname is required.
type may be 'top-level', 'subdomain', 'wildcard' or 'alias'. If is not provided, it will be 'top-level'. If type is 'alias', parentHostname it will be required.
parameters.name: createVirtualHostDto

parameters.description:
hostname, path and targetType are required.
matchPattern may be 'begins-with', 'contains', 'equals' or 'ends-with'. If is not provided, it will be 'begins-with'.
targetType may be 'url', 'service', 'response-code', 'inline-html' or 'static-files'. If targetType is 'url', targetHttpResponseCode may be provided. If is not provided, targetHttpResponseCode will be '200'. If targetType is 'response-code', targetHttpResponseCode may be provided. If is not provided, targetValue will be required.
targetValue must have the same value as the targetType requires.
parameters.name: createMappingDto

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" + JWT token or API key.
Bearer.name: Authorization
